snippet.title: Queer Quest: All in a Gay's Work announcement trailer
snippet.description:
There's a naked bike ride blocking the road. Ryan's selfies suck. Stevie Hix needs some tape for tucking. Oh, and your hot girlfriend is missing. Queer Quest is a classic point-and-click adventure game full of narrative puzzles, weird inventory items, and a whole lot of awkward acquaintances.

Follow us at: 
Web: adventuregamehotspot.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/ZUwXg7qwse
